titles.title: To redesignate the Federal building located at 935 Pennsylvania Avenue, NW, in Washington, DC, as the "Robert F. Kennedy and Martin Luther King, Jr., Federal Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, Hazardous Materials and Pipeline Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings, Hazardous Materials and Pipeline Transportation
committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 4/11/2000--Introduced. Redesignates the Federal building located at 935 Pennsylvania Avenue, NW, in Washington, D.C., serving as the headquarters of the Federal Bureau of Investigation, as the Robert F. Kennedy and Martin Luther King, Jr., Federal Building.
